availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Jefferson Perry (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Perry. Father of Marry Perry, Milton Perry, Harriet Perry, Charles Perry, and Sarah F. Perry. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 380A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 606.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 435.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p.180A.
"Thomas Jefferson Perry (1806-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial 8169380, accessed October 7, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/8169380.
